localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Host a listening party, hang with friends or meet new people while listening to great music and building playlists together. Let’s make the internet a little less quiet. Come say hi.
blogPost.body: Host a listening party, hang with friends or meet new people while listening to great music and building playlists together. Let’s make the internet a little less quiet. Come say hi.
blogPost.title: Roadtrip - Good tunes, good friends, good vibes.
blogPost.author: Harry Stebbings

localize.description: 举办一个聆听派对，和朋友一起闲逛，或者结识新朋友，一起听好音乐，一起建立播放列表。让我们把互联网弄得安静一点。过来打个招呼。
localize.tagline: 好的曲调，好的朋友，好的共鸣。

localize.description: 舉辦一個聆聽派對，和朋友一起閒逛，或者結識新朋友，一起聽好音樂，一起建立播放列表。讓我們把互聯網弄得安靜一點。過來打個招呼。
localize.tagline: 好的曲調，好的朋友，好的共鳴。

previous.excerpt: Daily prompts and inspiration to get your creativity flowing, and a wonderful community of artists to support you as you grow. I made it to get my mum to start drawing again, and now we get over 1000 submissions a day! Available on iOS and Android
previous.title: Sketch a Day: artist community & prompts - Daily prompts, powered by our positive community of artists

localize.description: 每天的提示和灵感，让你的创造力流动，和一个精彩的艺术家社区，支持你的成长。我做它是为了让我妈妈重新开始画画，现在我们每天有超过1000个提交的作品! 可在iOS和Android上使用
localize.tagline: 由我们积极的艺术家社区提供的每日提示。

localize.description: 每天的提示和靈感，讓你的創造力流動，和一個精彩的藝術家社區，支持你的成長。我做它是爲了讓我媽媽重新開始畫畫，現在我們每天有超過1000個提交的作品! 可在iOS和Android上使用
localize.tagline: 由我們積極的藝術家社區提供的每日提示。
